content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to execute shell commands and update the system but received error messages. The AI provided links to various websites with information on the Brno Reservoir trail in Czechia. I tried to execute a Python file, but received an error message. I then executed a shell command to install the necessary packages, which was successful. I attempted to execute the Python file again, but received the same error message. The AI conducted a web search and provided several links with information on the trail. I asked the AI to browse one of the websites for details on the trail, but it returned an error message. I received a message from the AI with links to various websites providing information on the Brno Reservoir trail. I executed a Python file that scrapes information from the AllTrails website, but it returned an error message. I executed a shell command to change the directory and run the Python file again, but it still returned an error message.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb\'Traceback (most recent call last):\\n  File "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/brno_reservoir_trail.py", line 11, in <module>\\n    trail_distance = soup.find(\\\'span\\\', {\\\'class\\\': \\\'detail-data\\\'}).text\\nAttributeError: \\\'NoneType\\\' object has no attribute \\\'text\\\'\\n\'', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "cd /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && python3 brno_reservoir_trail.py && python3 brno_reservoir_trail.py >> brno_reservoir_trail_output.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb\'Traceback (most recent call last):\\n  File "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/brno_reservoir_trail.py", line 11, in <module>\\n    trail_distance = soup.find(\\\'span\\\', {\\\'class\\\': \\\'detail-data\\\'}).text\\nAttributeError: \\\'NoneType\\\' object has no attribute \\\'text\\\'\\n\'', type='action_result')]
"""
